title.en: An Aspiration Prayer Composed by the Master Mahāsiddha Thangtong Gyalpo in the Presence of the Jowo Rinpoche in Lhasa

text.en: First, you generated the supreme mind of unsurpassable awakening
text.en-trans: tayé drowa ngepar drol ledu

text.en: Firmly set upon the liberation of sentient beings in their infinitude,
text.en-trans: lamé changchub chok tu tukkyé né

text.en: Then, you perfected the two accumulations, O compassionate Victorious One,
text.en-trans: tsok nyi dzok dzé gyalwa tukjé chen

text.en: You whose love embraces beings bereft of any protector in these degenerate times:
text.en-trans: gönmé nyikmé dro la tser gong né

text.en: Protect them without fail!
text.en-trans: trekom nyamtak dukngal gyi zirwé

text.en: For these beings plagued by hunger, thirst, difficulties, and suffering,
text.en-trans: lüchen didak ngepar kyab chirdu

text.en: Release upon the world and the Land of Snows
text.en-trans: rinchen zé nor dru dang mal cha sok

text.en: A rain of all the pleasant things the senses can enjoy,
text.en-trans: yi ong dögü longchö jinyé kyi

text.en: Including jewels, food, wealth, grain, and bedding!
text.en-trans: charpa dzamling khawachen du pob

text.en: Pacify harm among the four elements,
text.en-trans: dümin lung dang mé ten charchu sok

text.en: Untimely wind and fire, or inauspicious rains and waters!
text.en-trans: jung zhi nöpa nyewar zhiwa dang

text.en: Let grains, plants, harvests and the like
text.en-trans: dru chü tsitok lotok lasokpa

text.en: Mature fully, just as in the golden age!
text.en-trans: dzokden dü tar min ching gyé gyur chik

text.en: Through the strength of aspirations such as these,
text.en-trans: jam dang nyingjé shuk kyi rang kul né

text.en: Inspired by loving-kindness and compassion,
text.en-trans: gyachen mönlam tabpa di yi tü

text.en: May sicknesses, weapons, and famines be thoroughly pacified
text.en-trans: né tsön mugé kalwa nyerzhi né

text.en: And beings enjoy long life, good health, well-being and happiness!
text.en-trans: tsering nemé dekyi denpar shok

text.en: Through the power of the compassion of the victorious ones and their heirs,
text.en-trans: gyalwa sé dang chepé tukjé dang

text.en: And the infallible power of the interdependence of causes and results,
text.en-trans: lé dré luwa mepé den tob kyi

text.en: May the teachings of the Victorious One spread and flourish,
text.en-trans: gyalwé tenpa dar zhing gyepa dang

text.en: And all beings swiftly reach unsurpassable awakening!
text.en-trans: dro kün lamé changchub nyur tob shok
